# This is a test input file with P4Info for TableTypeMapperTest.  It contains
# snippets of the p4c P4Info output for tor.p4, plus an additional empty action
# for test purposes.
tables {
  preamble {
    id: 33554455
    name: "ingress.l3_admit_tor.l3_admit_tor_table"
    alias: "l3_admit_tor_table"
    annotations: "@switchstack(\"pipeline_stage: L2\")"
  }
  match_fields {
    id: 1
    name: "hdr.vlan_tag[0].vid"
    bitwidth: 12
    match_type: TERNARY
  }
  match_fields {
    id: 2
    name: "hdr.ethernet.dst_addr"
    bitwidth: 48
    match_type: TERNARY
  }
  action_refs {
    id: 16777244
  }
  action_refs {
    id: 16800566
  }
  action_refs {
    id: 16800567
    annotations: "@defaultonly()"
  }
  size: 1024
  is_const_table: true
}
tables {
  preamble {
    id: 33554453
    name: "ingress.l2_multicast.vlan_broadcast_table"
    alias: "vlan_broadcast_table"
    annotations: "@switchstack(\"pipeline_stage: L2\")"
  }
  match_fields {
    id: 1
    name: "hdr.vlan_tag[0].vid"
    bitwidth: 12
    match_type: EXACT
  }
  match_fields {
    id: 2
    name: "hdr.ethernet.dst_addr"
    bitwidth: 48
    match_type: EXACT
  }
  action_refs {
    id: 16777243
  }
  action_refs {
    id: 16800566
  }
  action_refs {
    id: 16800567
    annotations: "@defaultonly()"
  }
  size: 1024
  is_const_table: true
}
actions {
  preamble {
    id: 16800567
    name: "NoAction"
    alias: "NoAction"
  }
}
# This action has been added for tests to manipulate.
actions {
  preamble {
    id: 16800566
    name: "TestAction"
    alias: "TestAction"
  }
}
actions {
  preamble {
    id: 16777244
    name: "ingress.l3_admit_tor.set_l3_admit_tor"
    alias: "set_l3_admit_tor"
  }
}

    id: 16777243
    name: "ingress.l2_multicast.vlan_broadcast"
    alias: "vlan_broadcast"

    name: "multicast_group_id"
